xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/688064-Deep Fried Gold: The Nashville Hot Chicken Movement 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/vUduM1Ulynkb9Id6Ipl1WVKPy3t.jpg A look at the booming business of Nashville hot chicken and its origins. Interviews include Zach Stafford, former Nashville mayor Bill Purcell, Prince's Hot Chicken Shack owner Andre Prince Jeffries, and author of The Hot Chicken Cookbook Timothy Davis Deep Fried Gold: The Nashville Hot Chicken Movement
